Real Estate Mavericks is a real estate coaching company specializing in helping real estate agents become business generation and brand building experts, with the goal of growing a scalable business with salable value.  Our coaching is actually a franchise-like "business in a box" model because we provide an A-Z market penetration plan with proven advertising materials that establish a memorable brand while making the phone ring with quality clients who generate an immediate ROI.  Call 480-998-9900 or email greg@realestatemavericks.com to learn more.

Hague Partners is a boutique luxury home real estate firm specializing in Paradise Valley and Scottsdale AZ. Our mission is to help owners of higher priced homes sell privately at record high prices. The proprietary home selling process we developed was featured in Forbes and over 300 publications worldwide. Greg Hague, our founder, is considered America's leading real estate trainer in luxury home sales strategy. Learn more at www.haguepartners.com. Amazon revolutionized retail. Uber transformed transportation. We reinvented luxury home sale strategy.
CEO, HARVEY MACKAY UNIVERSITY - Real Estate Speaker, Trainer & Home Sale Strategist
Learn business strategies that propel success in real estate. Get exposed to the world's smartest minds, including the savvy of the incomparable, #1 New York Times bestselling author, Harvey Mackay.
BESTSELLING AUTHOR - How Fathers Change Lives, 52 Stories of Remarkable Dads - 5-Star Amazon Rated

Check out my 60+ 5 Star Amazon Bestselling Book on Fathering. YOU DON'T HAVE TO BUY IT. It's my gift to you at www.howfatherschangelives.com. SUMMARY A Chicken Soup collection of 52 inspiring stories about remarkable dads. What they do. What they say. How they change the lives of their kids.Each story is shared with us by a daughter or son (age 4 to 81). This book is filled with family photos. The writing style is unique. It flows like melted butter and reads with a rhythm and smoothness rarely seen.Read about the dad who coldly fired his son from the family business...but then helped that young man to a fabulous life. Or the father and son trucking along together on a dusty back road...and what happened with that Playboy Magazine they found in the dirt.Your heart will go out to four-year old Janie Hite. She was born with serious medical problems that will endure for life. Read her story about a dad who reached out desperately in the middle of the night to save her life.Endorsed by Harvey Mackay ( Swim with the Sharks fame) and Mark Victor Hansen ( Chicken Soup fame), this may be the best book of 2013.
FOUNDING PARTNER, Flexground International - An INC 500 Company

I am proud to be partners with my friends Bill Stafford Sr, Bill Stafford Jr. and my remarkable son, Corey Hague, in the fastest growing protective playground surfacing company in the nation. Selected as an INC 500 fastest growing company in 2014, Flexground is the country's leading installer of protective playground surfacing. With offices in Phoenix, AZ and Las Vegas NV and an office soon to open in southern California, my partners have done a remarkable job of building a world class company.

summary: I grew up in a "no excuses" home. C's were failure, B's average and A's were expected. While it was tough at the time, my parents taught me that effort overcomes obstacles. You have to power through the crap to have the cream. This attitude has worked well for me. This is my 50th year in real estate. My mom, dad, aunt and uncle were Realtors. My wife and youngest son are Realtors and my oldest son coaches Realtors. This profession has been amazing to me but I fear it is in jeopardy. Learn more at www.plantosaverealestate.com.  I am proud of the business achievements below because they exemplify the work ethic my parents instilled in me. What I lack in smarts I make up for in effort. I don't always succeed, but nobody has every faulted me for lack of trying. ‚ñ∫ Founder/CEO, 121 Office, 4000 Agent Real Estate Firm  ‚ñ∫ Founder/CEO #1 Ranked Luxury Home Arizona Brokerage ‚ñ∫ #1 Ranked Agent In Arizona‚ñ∫ #1 Luxury Home Agent in Arizona‚ñ∫ #26 Real Estate Team in America ‚ñ∫ 5 Star Avvo Superb Rated Attorney ‚ñ∫ #1 Score on Bar Exam‚ñ∫ Law Professor of the Year‚ñ∫ Former Dale Carnegie Instructor ‚ñ∫ Master Level Negotiator ‚ñ∫ Real Estate Contributor to Huffington Post, The Wall Street Journal & NPR  ‚ñ∫ Most Recommended Real Estate Trainer On LinkedIn‚ñ∫ Real estate strategies featured In Forbes, U.S. News & World Report, Kiplinger, NPR, Real Estate Today, Fox TV, The Wall Street Journal, and 300+ publications worldwide."Greg Hague is Muhammad Ali of Real Estate"... Muhammad Ali"If I coached real estate, Greg would be my quarterback"‚Äã ... Notre Dame Hall of Fame Coach Lou Holtz
